DataElement.preferredName: Pain Present Disease Yes No Uncertain Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify whether a person has ever had pain due to present disease.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Pain Present Disease or Disorder Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A disorder characterized by the sensation of marked discomfort, distress or agony._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time._Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A disorder characterized by the sensation of marked discomfort, distress or agony.

Concepts.definition: A disorder characterized by the sensation of marked discomfort, distress or agony.

Property.preferredDefinition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.:Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.:Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not established beyond doubt; still undecided or unknown.

Concepts.definition: Not established beyond doubt; still undecided or unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Have you ever had pain due to
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have you ever had pain due to your present disease?

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support NCI CCR clinical trial
